faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our luxury transportation services

vehicles.question: What types of vehicles do you offer?
vehicles.answer: Our premium fleet includes executive sedans, luxury SUVs, and spacious vans. All vehicles are latest models, meticulously maintained, and equipped with premium amenities for your comfort.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book?
booking.answer: While we can accommodate last-minute requests, we recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to ensure availability and allow time for any special arrangements.

coverage.question: What areas do you cover?
coverage.answer: We operate throughout Morocco, including Marrakech, Casablanca, Rabat, Fez, and all major tourist destinations. We also provide long-distance transfers between cities.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, bank transfers, and corporate payments. Payment can be made in advance or upon arrival according to your preference.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: We offer free cancellation up to 6 hours before the scheduled pickup time. For last-minute cancellations, charges may apply.

airportTransfers.question: Do you provide airport transfers?
airportTransfers.answer: Yes, we specialize in airport transfers with flight tracking and meet-and-greet services. Our chauffeurs monitor flight status to ensure timely pickup, regardless of delays.

languages.question: What languages do your chauffeurs speak?
languages.answer: Our chauffeurs are fluent in multiple languages including English, French, Arabic, and Spanish. We ensure language compatibility for all our clients' needs.
